153.content:
A raven screeched as Gale plucked the wildberry out of the ground.
The scavenger looked up in the direction of the screech, but it was merely the birds cry as other ravens began to descend over the corpses of the battleground. Gale afixed his goggles over his head and wiped some dust off of them and off his forehead. Like many orphans left over from the war, his eyes had a cybernetic green lens over them.
The boy tossed the wildberry into his backpack and struggled up the muddy hill. Here, next to the harsh sunlight, the corpses of fallen soldiers had led to more flowers springing up from their bodies.
After a few more arduous minutes of scouring on that hill, Gale decided to sit down and rest. He removed his goggles and tossed them by the ferns, then unwrapped his scarves and hood. Here it was high enough that he didnt need face protection from the smog. He could, instead, see unobstructed, the entire swath of miasmic, dark green smog covering the land like a restless ocean. Above, the sky was an organic mess of bruises, stretching all the way to the horizon.
"What a view!" said the scavenger.
Shorn of his goggles and scarf, the orphan appeared no more than a boy just on the brink of manhood, with dark, uncut hair framing a slightly malnourished face that still retained the glow of youth. Only the cybernetic emerald eyes and the roman numerals XII tattooed on his neck betrayed his war-smote birth. He had gun implants in his wrists and bionic steel fibres in his skinny arms and legs. Every now and then when Gale walked close to a working radio station, his brain would buzz with old transmitted orders, obselete now that the war was over, echoing a melody of repetivite orders, coordinates, a refrain to times gone past.
Gale would guess that if he had an age, he'd be around 15 or 16. He knew that before the war, 16 year olds would be just entering something called highschool, and things like love and destiny and grades would be on their minds. He liked to watch old prewar movies on his spare time if he found any in abandoned malls. He sometimes would stare at his own reflection in the dark smoggy glass, trying to fit his image in the lives on the screen. Not that he cared, but Gale would have liked to undergo those movie adventurs, to meet someone his age, to worry about calculus and not survival.
Another raven screech broke the boy from his reverie. Gale bundled his goggles, scarves and hood back together, gave the scenery one last look, and trundled down the hill. The ravens would, eventually, bring other scavengers, raiders, and even warlords to this fresh battlefield. Everyone knew that war orphans were opportune kidnap targets and fetched a hefty price on tbe black market. Gale was strong enough to fight off most raiders but too many would overwhelm him. The boy descended the hill, back into the smoke, and back into the dark gloomy world.
153.title: Choose your own Male Tickling Scenario #1

1532.content:
Yellow headlights burst from the smog. Gale brought one hand over his face as the bright glare cut through the darkness. Numerous huge golden eyes blinked into existence out of the shadows, accompanied by the rip of motorcycles and the howling of their riders.
Raiders, thought Gale, his heart tightening with fear.
They rode into view like a pack of starving wolves. Black leather bodies with spikes and chains atop huge metal bikes that spat and roared gouts of oily smoke. Their chants ringed the air, wild and animalistic.
Gale scanned their ranks, silently counting. He saw the white skull crossed with two guns on their leader's banner. The Ghostbloods, he thought. How unfortunate.
Gale had been caught by raiders before and he had fought the Redhands, the Ruffled Feathers, and the Whiteskulls. He had never dealt with the Ghostbloods before and didnt know their customs.
Then he saw their cargo.
The motorcycles were chain linked to a massive wooden wagon, belted with crude metal bands, where a number of young boys and girls were chained up and gagged. They all wore grey dirty tunics, their skinny legs poking out and tied up. There were maybe fifteen in total, all jammed together in a cage, their feet sticking out of the bars in some places. Each jostle of the wagon tossed them around, into one another, or against the cage wall.
Slavers.
Gale backed away, dropping his backpack full of wildberries. He raised one hand and a small machine extended out, letting forth a ripple of bullets.
"He's a damn Windrunner!" The raiders cried as their motorcycles exploded, flinging them into the gloom.
"Get the boy alive! Theyre worth a fortune on the market!" The bikers converged on him, tightening the circle they wove around him.
One threw a chain that lashed his right wrist. Gale yanked on it to no avail. He grabbed another pistol from his belt and closed one eye to aim. He pegged two more riders as well as the one chaining his wrist in quick, professional motion.
"Damn hes good!" cried the raiders in frustration.
Two more gun bursts and Gale knew hed ran out of ammo. Half of the raiders were still alive and just as crazy on capturing him.
He unsheathed a pair of rusty knives and sprinted at the nearest raider. The raider goosed his bike and the huge motorcycle hurtled towards Gale, roaring. A joust. The nimble boy leaped up last minute, his body horizontal with the ground, cape flapping, and knifed the raider through the neck like a surgeon.
Gale hit the ground in a roll. He heard a massive explosion as his victims bike crashed into some rocks.
He had a way free! And yet, as he looked behind him, the collection of boys and girls were still trapped. Just a few feet away.
Should he go back and help them? There was no reason to and he had no more ammo and yet...
1532.title: Gale is stopped by raiders

15321.content:
Something struck a cord in the scavenger's chest. He, against all good reason, turned around and began sprinting towards the wagon.
A few raiders were staggering up, shellshocked. The boy lashed out with his knives as he ran, and with a silver blur, those raiders collasped back down, almost as if asleep if not for the red smiles on their necks.
"Get him!" screamed a raider. "Thats a million credits if we catch him!"
The wagon was so close! One of the prisoners, noticing Gale, nudged a girl with his bare foot, and she blinked, eyes widening as she saw Gale. Soon all the slaves in the wagon were making muffled noises in their gags, excited for their rescue.

"I got him!" cried the raider. "Quick someone help!"
Gale squirmed, his legs kicking the air. "Not so tough now are you, little boy?" rasped the raider through his bandana. "Now that I look at you, youre just a skinny little thing."
Someone came and snapped a pair of manacles over Gale's calves. His captor rose up, carrying the boy in a bearhug.
Now that he was up close, he could tell his captor was actually a woman, merely padded up in bulk with armor, and head covered by a helmet. She lifted him up, showing him off to her confederates and they cheered, jeering at him and slapping his rear.
They ripped away his facial protection, tossed were his goggles, scarves and hoods. Gale blinked his neon green eyes in the smoggy air.
"Oh hes a cutie," said another woman, pinching his cheek.
"See the tattoo?" said his captor, tracing a greedy finger along his neck. "Thats the newest military model. Hell fetch so so much money on the market."
Horror and fear gripped Gale's heart as they binded his arms and legs. The woman whod caught him shoved a gag between his lips and then poked his nose, clearly drunk now, thanking him for making them so rich. She then methodically strip searched him, running her fingers along his skinny body while he squirmed with discomfort. The others watched, including the other slaves in the wagon, as the woman stripped away the warrior boy's jacket, tunic, knives, spare pistol, his trousers and boots and woolen stockings as well.
"He doesnt look nearly so dangerous barefoot and in his undies does he?" brayed the woman, still drunk, while twirling an angry, red faced Gale on display to her fellow raiders. They all clapped and cheered, some tossing beer at Gale's almost naked body making him shiver.
"What does a skinny lad like you need big boots for?" teased his captor, shaking his boot. "Show everyone your foot." When he refused, she lifted his ankle up and presented his slender sole to the crowd, evidenting her point.
His humiliation over, Gale was tied to a pole next to the wagon while they set up camp. He was too dangerous to leave unattended so they tied his arms behind him, his ankles cross legged, and a blindfold over his eyes. After a long draining hour of trying to reason with his drunken captor, she allowed him his trousers back though she kept his boots and socks. The bargain was that she was allowed to clasp an old dog collar theyd found in some ruined neighborhood to his neck which read 'Sparky'. Apart from his trousers it was the only thing Gale was allowed to wear. At night the cold made him shiver and try to tuck his knees inwards.
He couldnt believe he had been captured by such a group of incompetents. If only he had stocked up his ammo earlier or he had found more knives to use. Now he was chained up and cold and shirtless and barefoot and completely helpless to whatever fate they had planned for him. If only he had run away instead of try and help.
153212.title: Gale is captured

1532122.content:
"A Windrunner huh?" The tall redhaired woman pinched Gale's check. "I wouldnt have believed there were any left."
She occupied a wide fast food resturant that had been refurbished into something resembling a medical clinic. Old degrading posters advertising chicken at 3.99 were covered up with newer posters of hard men and women in bounty prices, and the nearest and biggest markets in New America.
Madam Schultz's was a famous hotspot for bounty appraisals and pawning nicknacks. It was also a fireside horror story for orphans who knew that slave poachers frequented the area with new boys and girls to sell.
Dr. Shultz traced her finger along Gale's sharp jawline, marvelling at the lack of facial hair. She got to his tattoo and delicately traced the XII. Gale shivered and bit his lip, uncomfortable with the foreign doctor's cold fingers.
"Whys he squirming like that?" asked Susanne.Without her usual raider garb, the woman turned out to be surprisingly attractive, in a brusque, unapologetic way. She had close cropped blonde hair and a face as sharp as a battle ax. A metal nose ring and lip ring were her only adornments although Gale had noticed many of the other raiders infatuated with her. As his main captor and 'owner', she had been insistent on being there when he got appraised.
"The newer models have enhanced dermal reception."
"Eh?"
"More sensitive than you or me," explained Shultz. With one hand, she gripped Gale's chin, while the other continued molesting his neck. "Especially Windrunners. They were programmed to feel minute shifts in the air during battle. Ideally, theyd fly top huge metal mounts high in the air, cutting the wings off fighter jets and such."
"I dun get it" muttered Susanne. "Does that lower his value?"
"It just means he's ticklish," said Shultz, annoyed. "If anything, most slavers like that in younger slaves. Makes them easy to punish without physical force." To emphasize, she wiggled her fingers into Gale's bare armpit, making the boy shudder and giggle uncontrollably.
Susanne rolled with mirth. "Look at the kid. Oh so tough and yet so ticklish like a baby!"
Gale reddened with anger but couldnt say anything. He was strapped to a reclined bench, completely immobile and as helpless as a lamb. Susanne had taken care that every part of him was completely tied down, even hiring a professional restrainer. The old restrainer had bound Gale's slender arms and legs in criss cross networks of rope, wrapping his waist, chest, and even his crotch to Susanne's teasing humor. Theyd bound his toes and fingers in a similiar network of smaller rope. Now, to be gawked at, completely naked, by Dr. Shultz with her cold discerning eye and Susanne, his personal tormentor was all Gale could take to stay calm.
"This widdle boy is ticklish!" Susanne crowed."Soooo menacing. Keep glaring Sparky, youre a real terror when you giggle!"
"Windrunners are fast and highly intelligent," said Shultz disapprovingly. "Their ticklishness is hardly their most vaunted trait. Apart from artificial implants to enhance strength and speed, not to mention weapon implants in their wrists, their very DNA is twisted to give them the most desirable traits."
"So you saying his green eyes and pale skin is natural?"
"The green cyber eyes no," said Schultz. Her gloved hand rested over Gale's chest like an engineer stroking a machine. "But the rest of his pale complexion and dark hair yes. I would guess Irish, Korean, and native Australian as his main strands, but there are likely hundreds others, all carefully mixed at the right degrees to grow the best traits."
"Hear that Sparky?" asked Susanne, ruffling his hair. "Youre a freak of nature is what you are."
Gale burst into movement, sinking his teeth into Susanne's thick fingers. The woman howled, screaming, but Gale refused to let go.
Hot iron warmth burst into his mouth as he broke the skin. Susanne shrieked, smacking him in the face with her other hand.
I'm going to rip that hand off, thought the former scavenger, eyes burning with anger.
Then he felt something fine and feathery caress the bottoms of his feet. Ticklishness shot through the boy's trapped body and he opened his mouth, laughing in frustration.
Dr. Schultz was spinning a red feather casually under his arches, causing him to spasm.
"Thats a good way to get this one under control," said Dr. Shultz. She nodded sternly to Gale. "Will you behave?"
"Yes ahahhahaha yesshahaha" cried Gale, squeezing his eyes. His whole naked body swayed with the tickling, including his member.
"Good boy," said Dr. Schultz. She put away the feather and then tucked Gale's unit back into place between his legs nice and neat much to his embarassment.
"I would say you can sell this one for at least 2 million credits."
"Two million!?" Susanne barked. "Wowee."
"4 million if you can tame him though," said Schultz. "I know alot of clients who would love him. But hes too wild still."
Susanne's eyes bulged with greed.
"I would recommend some tickling every couple hours," said Schultz. "Fingers and from many people to help break his pride. He needs to learn obedience so you need to be thorough and strict."
Susanne's smile widened and the raider woman snapped Gale's collar over his neck. She didnt bother undoing the rest of his bondage after unstrapping him.
"Thats perfect. Like always, youll get 5 percent of the shares for your stamp of legatamaty."
"Legitimacy" Dr. Schultz corrected. She bent down and lifted Gale's skinny legs up. "Hold him still please."
Susanne sat over Gale, nearly crushing him, as the redhaired woman signed her name on the bottom of his boyish ticklish foot. Gale sputtered and laughed as Susanne's face hovered over his. In a matter of seconds it was done.
1532122.title: They take him to a professional to be appraised

15321221.content:
"You know.." Something like arousal and control broke the redhaired woman's composure as her eyes raked Gale's naked body once more. "For two hundred credits I can train him myself for a week."
"Oh?" said Susanne. "And why should I give the boy to you? Need a bashlger's degree just to cootchie coo a boy?"
"Bachelor's" corrected Schultz. "And no. But I have had experience with military grade orphans. A few Flamespeakers and even a Shadowblade one time."
"Big deal."
"Theyre smart and devious." Schultz nodded to Susanne's ravaged hand. "Especially this one, I can tell. Hes been a survivor for a long time."
Again that look of lust and yearning broke over the doctors facade for a second as her gaze met Gales. He felt a shiver at the look. Being completely naked and tied up from his toes to his poor unit didnt help. His bare feet itched from where those horrible red feathers had tickled them. The dark haired boy felt something warm and disturbing uncoil in his lower stomach from the redhead woman's hungry look.
"I think im ok," snickered Susanne. "Thanks for the stamp of legatmacy."
Schultz didnt correct her, just shook her head at the loss of potential. She could have turned this boy into something great, doubled, tripled bis price; instead he was going to be the plaything of raiders.
Not to mention the moment shed touched those perfect, pink, silky soles, she'd been instantly smitten.

At the Ghostbloods camp, dawn was breaking. Raiders, out of costume, staggered out of tents to fix breakfast, some carrying willowy girls with them, others doozy with drugs. The scent of bear stew thickened the air. A few of the more limber raiders were dangling their feet off the hill theyd camped on, watching the sun rise.
Isolated from this atmosphere of lethargy, a slave girl was rushing through the camp, her ponytail swinging, while her manacled ankles blurred through puddles and mud. She carried a stick between her shoulders, balancing two buckets of leftover meat elegantly on her light frame.
"Wake up Duck!" she yelled.
The boy in the wagon rose up, rubbing one eye. His hair had been cropped to his scalp, revealing an angular skull and sharp, dangerous eyes. Those eyes softened when he saw the girl.
"Thanks Mimsy," he said as she offered him some stale bear meat.
Others passed the food around until everyone was fed.
"Here" said Duck, handing his share back to Mimsy. "You havent eaten right?"
"Aaron lets me eat whatever I want," said Mimsy, smiling. "He wants me healthy after all every night."
Duck winced inwardly. "Well just take it anyway. Im not that hungry." The thought of Mimsy, trapped underneath the hulking body of the Ghostbloods leader....
A sour silence passed over them as Mimsy rolled her eyes, wishing her friend would stop plotting how to kill the raider leader in his sleep. There was really no point. After all, she was going to be the one to do it.
"Have you seen Kai?" asked Mimsy suddenly.
"No," replied Duck. "She left sometime last night when the guards werent looking."
"Is she still trying to escape?"
"Maybe? Who knows what that girl thinks. Ever since the new guy Sparky showed up shes been nothing but jittery."
"I think his name is Gale."
Everyone turned around.
Kai was standing there, as though by magic. The Asian American's face was streaked by black soot and her slave tunic was in tatters revealing the beautiful koi fish tattoos flowing from her chin to her collarbone and arms. At a full head shorter than Mimsy, she was still the most intimidating thing in a 5 mile radius, slavers included.
"Come on," said Kai. "I found where theyre holding him. Lets pay him a visit."
"What?" said Duck. "Youre insane. Why do you suddenly care about a slave boy?"
"You saw how he moved," said Kai. "Hes not like us."
"No way, we'll get killed."
"No we wont" Kai rolled her eyes. "Guard shifts are at their lightest in the morning. As long as we dont go near the perimeter no one will notice you wuss."
Mimsy and Duck exchanged a wary look. They knew Kai would go with or without them.
"Fine" said Mimsy. "But eat some food first. Youre skinny as a stick."

153212211.content:
The good news was he got his clothes back.
In a long document printed by Dr. Schultz, Susanne had squinted at all the symptoms he might catch, one of which was pnemonia. So now instead of huddling at night in his threadbare trousers and nothing else, she'd allowed him a fishnet tunic over his bare chest and slippers. The dog collar stayed.
Each morning, a pair of slaves changed his manacles, lotioned his wrists and ankles from the wear, while a raider pointed a rifle at him yawning.
Then Susanne came, clipped a leash to his collar, and would tease him by diddling her fingers along his nipples, then his inner thighs and finally his plump toes. The boy would resist as best he could for a few seconds and then as his face grew more red and tears inched from his squeezed eyes, hed burst into uncontrollable giggles, flexing his trapped boyish toes over her rough fingernails. Susanne made sure she heard him eventually beg, usually because his bladder wouldnt hold out and he didnt want to humiliate himself further.
"Who's a ticklish widdle boy?" asked the blonde older woman.
"Mehahahaha meee!" shouted the tough boy.
"And whos got the most tickwish widdle toes in the world?"
"I hahahahaha I doooo hahaha!"
If Susanne was feeling really cruel, she would grab his slender ankle and pop one or two toes into her mouth which made the dark haired boy scream. She then raced her fingers under his sole, savouring the sensation of his oval shaped toes wiggling inside her mouth, on the inside of her cheeks.
Then, once Gale's spirit was momentarily broken, she would remove her own huge boots revealing her brutish, large feet and place them over his head. Gale, hating himself for doing it, would be forced to worship those big feet over his head, lapping them up.
The young boy was then fed and 'walked' on his leash across the camp while other raiders jeered at him and laughed. Other older women and a few men would come and request to tickle him for a few minutes. Susanne drove a hard bargain, making lots of money in exchange for having a dozen women hold Gale down and make the boy beg and scream.
Finally, hed be allowed lunch while Susanne went on raids with her friends. A few of the raiders children liked to play with Gale then while he was tied up and helpless. At first they were scared, but after one girl - Hannah, the Ghostbloods boss's daughter - made him squeal after flicking her fingernail up his slender pink bare foot, they played with him in earnest.
Soon the devious girl Hannah had all of Gales most ticklish spots mapped out including diagrams of his sweet boyish soles. The green eyed boy would struggle and emit high girlish yelps as Hannah instructed her friends on how to tickle Gale.
"Not like THAT Mary, like THIS." Her small fingers drove down Gale's bare feet like little centipedes.
"Ahahahhahaha!"
"like this?" A messier scribble on his soles made Gale sputter and gasp.
"No no, too fast and youre avoiding his sweet spot here at the foot center." A tap on the aforementioned spot nearly made Gale piss his pants.
"Here?"
"Eeeek!"
"Yes, you got it now watch closer this time. My tickle pet makes the best noises when you cootchie him patiently."
"Isnt he Susanne's tickle pet?" Mary asked.
"No" said Hannah, thankfully stopping before Gale really did piss. He hung his head, gasping, red faced and embarassed out of his mind as the younger girl said "since my daddy owns the entire raiding tribe, everything belongs to him which means this boy belongs to me as well" Hannah turned around, cupped Gale's gasping, teary eyed face. "Let me show you."
And that was the worst of it. Many raiders would gather and watch and taunt as the petite girl began to stroke Gale's limp member with her cold hands while tickling his chest with her other. His hands and toes would clench and flex, digging into the wooden post as she stroked him harder and harder, her face inches from his. Gale tried to close his eyes, but the tickles made him laugh and buck all the same.
"Look at the poor kitty cat," cooed Hannah. "Does he want a release from mommy? Does he?"
The other kids watched in rapt as the raiders hooted and cheered. Hannah would sneak a tickle on his balls and then pinch his inner thigh making Gale shriek.
In the end, the spoiled brat would lift her own petite foot up and force Gale to lick and clean her feet while she slapped his face with other other foot. If he slowed down, shed squeeze his member or slap his bare feet with a stick. By the time Susanne came back, Gale would be a limp gasping boy hanging at his post, a white dripple on his inner leg, and toes twitching from phantom tickles.
Susanne would laugh, tickle him some more, and then take him back to his post. Gale slept brutally, plotting his revenge, wishing he could have just the smallest chance for vengeance.
Then one day, before the morning broke the sky, he got his chance.

The boy was napping. His head lolled forward, dark unkempt hair falling over his face. How anyone slept wearing so little and tied like that Mimsy didnt know. But his shallow chest was rising up and down with weary rest.
"Poor thing," said Mimsy.
"He doesnt look so dangerous" said Duck. "Are you sure it's the same person? He looks harmless to me."
The blonde boy walked up and nudged Gale with his toe. "Wake up Sparky."
The boy exploded into motion, his body becoming a pale blur. Mimsy had a second to dart back before he had Duck pinned to the ground, his teeth hovering over the squealing blondes neck.
A pair of bright green eyes snapped open.
"Who are you people?" The boy asked calmly.
"Friends" said Kai, lifting her foot to show him her own signature from Dr. Schultz.
"Slaves" the boy spat.
Like a serpent uncoiling, he released Duck, as though he was disgusted. Slouching over, the tied up boy glared away from them. Duck scampered away, rubbing his neck.
"Wow some attitude," said Mimsy, rescinding her sympathy.
"It's because I tried to save you guys that I got caught."
"It's because you were stupid enough to fight raiders you got caught" snapped Duck.
"Ive fought raiders before," snapped Gale.

"Weakling!"
Duck curled his fist. "If you werent tied up right now..."
"I could be tied up, blindfolded and gagged and Id still whip your ass" Gale sneered.

"Enough!" Kai stepped between them and frowned at Gale. "We didnt come here to piss around."

Silence ensued for a few seconds.
"Youre the Bitch Queens new toy" said Mimsy finally. "Weve all been there. It sucks."

"Shes allergice but she doesnt know it" said Mimsy. She nodded to Kai. "Kais the one who found out about it. No one else even in the camp knows. Give it a few days and shell be sick of tormenting you."

"We'll see you around" said Kai. "Maybe dont be such a dick next time"
153212211.title: Gale's New Life

choices: Gale meets with the other slaves
Gale is taken to the market
1532122112.content:
"Who cares?" asked Hannah, twirling one pigtail between forefinger and thumb.
"Those who do not learn from history," said Gin, pushing her glasses up her nose severely. "Are doomed to repeat it."
Hannah sighed into her fist, stealing a glance outside their tent into the new city that the Ghostbloods had entered.
Gracewind, like all of New America's cities, rose on top of great elevation, where the world's natural pungent smog wouldnt reach. However, unlike most cities, this one had been built over a prewar city that her father called Atlanta. It was strewn in a network of bridges and canvases and planks across the top of Atlanta's skyscrapers, hanging like a dirty spiderweb over the city's vertiginous buildings.
And like any modern city, her father had forced her to learn from whatever teachers it had. While her friends were off playing around, she was forced to learn useless facts and memorize old names. She wished she could escape, could watch the slave market, or explore the fascinating city.
Or play with her new toy.
"Hey Gin" said Hannah innocently. "Tell me about the war orphans."
"Thats quite a 180 from the Great Hatching" said her boring teacher "but I suppose it does lead into the third and final world war.
The Iron Orphans were developed as a joint project between North America and Russia as a secret weapon against the Hatched. It began as a way to convert the massive hordes of orphaned children from natural disasters into something profitable but the governments soon realized that with scientific tinkering, they could, in essence, create the perfect soldiers by mixing geneolgies and inserting biomedical implants."

Gale threw his head back, clenched his jaw, and concentrated on the fast moving clouds in the sky.
"Oh no you dont" teased Hannah's voice. She walked her fingers up his bare leg, drawing goosebumps and shivers. "You. Dont. Get. To look. Away. Like that."
Her nails were sharp and fingers freezing as she stroked his inner thigh, savoring the warmth of his body. Gale sputtered, twisting his trapped arms for any kind of purchase, his toes scrunched downwards with apprehension. In the end, after a few more teasing strokes on his hips and thighs, she was right and he ended up glancing at his tormentor.
Hours of being locked away had clearly ramped the fire in Hannah's eyes. She smiled sadistically and began drawing her fingernails backwards, closer to his ankles and his heels. "Cootchie cootchie coooo my little toy."

"Many many types of orphans were developed by later during the war, only 12 were mass produced due to practicality. Each had a distinct role and ability. The Flamespeakers and Slayers could call forth massive destruction. The Shadowblades, Dreamweavers, and Spiders were unparalled assassins. Behemoths and Windrunners became elite soldiers."

Gale watched grimly as Hannah's small hands gripped his bare foot and forced it upright while her friends tied it into place, plucking his long toes backwards until his sole was taut and immobile. She snapped her fingers and two other girls pushed a bucket between them. Gale felt a twinge of fear as he saw it was sloshing with water.

"Of course, with these augmentations, most orphans never live past a very long age. Many who were born during the war are not alive today. The orphans that we refer to in New America are those who were made just after the war and are mostly untrained and mostly teenagers. A shadow of the lethal weapons their predecessors were."

Hannah noticed the boy's shift in expression and sloshed a big sponge in one bucket. "Time to get you all cleaned up my tickle toy" she said, wiping the sponge roughly against Gales foot. Gale howled, bursting into motion as the smaller girl began swiping the sponge in earnest up and down his pink sole.

"However...theyre still considered one of the most dangerous quary for bounty hunters or slavers. Even without training or experience, they are naturally...ruthless."

"Cootchie cootchie coo" teased Hannah skittering her nails across Gale's tenderized feet, wet and red and shiny from the cleaning. The green eyed boy exploded with laugher. She dipped her nails all scross in lazy zizags over every inch of his soft warm feet. She cocked her head, smiling at the rise in pitch each time she skated over the center of his sole which was his worst spot. Then, utilizing his taut, tied up toes, she began diddling her little nails between each of the boys plump toes, teasing ever so lightly the webbing between each toe, the undersides. She even gave them a gentle nibble with her teeth, causing girlish laugher to rocket out of her boy toy.
Oh how soft and warm they were! She traced the slight wrinkles across his soles, leaving faint white lines on the pink soapy surface. She nuzzled her cheek against his feet, feeling the warmth and velvety softness against her face while the boy they belonged to sputtered with helpless laughter.
Mine, mine mine, she thought. She was the luckiest girl in the world. With so many toys. Such wonderful tools. Everything she wanted she could have.
"Now then" said Hannah, smiling at the slender dark haired boy's quivering member. "Are you ready for your next lesson my twickly toy?"
Gale moaned as he felt her hands touch him. This time she had abandoned all foreplay and was roughly tugging him with dominating ferocity.
Hannah was having the time of her life. Having a cute boy as her pet gave her a power rush like she couldnt believe. Everything was going great and then...
And then she stopped.

"Ruthless in nature. Incomparable in ingenuity and resourcefulness. Many wealthy owners have made the error of purchasing a War Orphan as a slave without proper taming. Nearly all are eventually...well..."

Hannah staggered back. A familiar sensation crawled up her throat. Only this time it was stronger. Too strong. She sank to her knees, the cries of her friends and other raiders like echoes an ocean away. All she could feel was the wind too cold on her skin, and that itching suffocation in her throat.
And then nothing at all.

Last night, Gale not used a little bit of wildberry to coat his body like Mimsy recommended. He had chewed the berries up and spat them out, knowing that the berries' potency lay in the juices after being ground up. Afterward theyd be at least a hundred times more severe.
Gasping now, catching his breath, the boy watched savagely as the other raiders tried to rejuvenate the boss's daughter. He didnt allow himself a smile, not even a candlelight of joy, but instead was planning his next move.
